name: Dawn
description: '''Dawn''' is a Swedish [[extreme metal]] band from [[Linköping]], formed by Frederik Söderberg in 1990; while they disbanded for nearly a decade, they have reconvened and are active today. The band has released eight recordings, including two full-length albums. The next album, 'The Fourfold Furnace', was announced as early as 2003, and finally scheduled to be issued in 2008, but it actually never came out.
